dict.acceptation: 电话；听筒；（发声或使用声音的）工具；说某种语言的；

sent.orig: Payment: We accept Visa, Master and Discover by Phone and PayPal online.
sent.trans: 付款：我们接受签证，由Phone和PayPal在网上掌握并且发现。

sent.orig: In mobile phone market change greatly in the bureau, homebred mobile phone had along new crossroad.
sent.trans: 在手机市场的大变局中，国产手机已经走到了新的十字路口。

sent.orig: I can' t reach him by phone / on the phone.
Yes. If you use the magnetic card phone set, you should buy a phone card.
sent.trans: 可以，如果你使用磁卡电话机，要买一张磁卡。

sent.orig: A SUNFLOWER is a sunflower. A mobile phone is a mobile phone.
sent.trans: 大家都知道，向日葵和手机，一个是植物，一个是机器，二者是截然不同的。
